title.narrative: Guinea Support to Local Governance Project

description.narrative: To improve local government capacity in managing their public financial resources in a transparent and participatory manner, and in mitigating local conflicts

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Territorial Administration and Decentralization

condition.narrative: No later than five (5) months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall recruit an internal auditor and an accountant for thePIU and an external auditor for the Project, all with qualifications and experience satisfactory to the Association.
